description: SupplyRisk Monitor assists a supply‑chain analyst by retrieving real‑time rail logistics status from Frankfurt to Milan, adding geopolitical risk scores for Germany and Italy, storing a comprehensive risk report, and emailing a concise summary to the analyst.
